select1.label: Lay the bandage on inner side of wrist , leaving 4 inches of end free , thereby finally a knot may be made in tying off the bandage

Carry the head of bandage over back of hand obliquely to little finger side of root of finger to be covered ,make lose spiral turn to reach its tip , and carry bandage over tip , holding it in position in middle of finger with own forefinger and thumb

Carry bandage over tip of finger 3 or 4 times , securing the folds with your forefinger and thumb .in doing so this pass first loop over center of fingertip and second turn to one side of tip and third to opposite side .these 3 turns should completely cover the finger tip , unless dressing is bulky , when one or two additional turns on either side must be made
Next carry bandage up the fingers by simple spiral turns to hold finger tips loops in position. at the root of finger carry bandage over the back of hand to the wrist and tie off the ends
